name: Ember Wyrmling
flavorText: A young dragon whose flames burn with limitless potential.

name: Infernal Hatchling
flavorText: Born from volcanic ash, it seeks its first flame.

name: Scorched Serpent
flavorText: Its scales glow red from the eternal fire within.

name: Flame Whelp
flavorText: The smallest spark can ignite the greatest inferno.

name: Blazing Drake
flavorText: Its wings leave trails of fire across the sky.

name: Cinder Wyrm

effects.name: Smoldering Scales
effects.description: This card gains 200 ATK during your Battle Phase.

flavorText: The heat it radiates can melt steel.

name: Magma Hatchling

effects.name: Molten Birth
effects.description: When this card is destroyed: Inflict 300 damage to your opponent.

flavorText: Even in death, its flames persist.

name: Infernal Scout

effects.name: Searing Speed
effects.description: This card can attack directly if your opponent controls no monsters in Attack Position.

flavorText: It finds prey even in the darkest depths.

name: Pyroclast Wyvern

effects.name: Volcanic Breath
effects.description: Once per turn: Inflict 200 damage to your opponent.

flavorText: Its breath carries the fury of erupting volcanoes.

name: Smoldering Newt

effects.name: Fire Trail
effects.description: When this card inflicts battle damage: Draw 1 card, then discard 1 card.

flavorText: Small but dangerously hot.

name: Ashen Dragonet
flavorText: Covered in the ash of fallen foes.

name: Kindled Basilisk
flavorText: Its gaze burns as hotly as its flames.

name: Infernal Vanguard

effects.name: Piercing Flame
effects.description: This card inflicts piercing battle damage.

flavorText: The first to charge, the last to fall.

name: Blazetail Guardian

effects.name: Burning Shield
effects.description: When this card is attacked: Inflict 400 damage to your opponent after damage calculation.

flavorText: Its tail whip leaves burning scars.

name: Crimson Firebreather

effects.name: Infernal Blast
effects.description: Once per turn: Destroy 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls.

flavorText: Nothing survives its crimson breath.

name: Volcanic Striker

effects.name: Eruption Strike
effects.description: When this card destroys a monster by battle: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

flavorText: Each strike brings volcanic devastation.

name: Flame Herald

effects.name: Call of Fire
effects.description: When Summoned: Add 1 'Infernal' Spell from your deck to your hand.

flavorText: It announces the arrival of the inferno.

name: Magma Carrier

effects.name: Molten Delivery
effects.description: All 'Infernal Dragons' monsters you control gain 300 ATK.

flavorText: It carries the heart of the volcano within.

name: Pyre Sentinel

effects.name: Flame Watch
effects.description: Once per turn, when an 'Infernal Dragons' monster you control would be destroyed: You can destroy this card instead.

flavorText: It guards the flame with its life.

name: Infernal Charger

effects.name: Reckless Charge
effects.description: This card can attack twice per Battle Phase, but is destroyed at the end of the Battle Phase.

flavorText: It lives only for the thrill of battle.

name: Infernal Warlord

effects.name: Commanding Flame
effects.description: All 'Infernal Dragons' monsters you control gain 400 ATK.

effects.name: Warlord's Strike
effects.description: This card inflicts piercing battle damage.

flavorText: Under its command, all dragons burn brighter.

name: Volcanic Dragon

effects.name: Eruption
effects.description: When Summoned: Destroy all Spell/Trap cards your opponent controls.

flavorText: Born from the deepest magma chambers.

name: Infernal Ravager

effects.name: Ravaging Flames
effects.description: When this card destroys a monster by battle: Destroy 1 card your opponent controls.

flavorText: It leaves nothing but ashes in its wake.

name: Pyromancer Drake

effects.name: Spell Ignition
effects.description: Once per turn: You can discard 1 'Infernal' Spell; inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.

flavorText: It channels magic into pure destructive fire.

name: Hellfire Wyrm

effects.name: Hellfire Aura
effects.description: During each End Phase: Inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each 'Infernal Dragons' monster you control.

flavorText: The fires of the underworld obey its call.

name: Infernal Tyrant

effects.name: Tyrannical Flames
effects.description: Cannot be destroyed by battle.

effects.name: Infernal Decree
effects.description: Once per turn: Destroy 1 monster your opponent controls with ATK less than this card's ATK.

flavorText: All lesser dragons kneel before its might.

name: Volcanic Behemoth

effects.name: Magma Body
effects.description: This card inflicts piercing battle damage.

effects.name: Volcanic Devastation
effects.description: When this card destroys a monster by battle: Inflict damage equal to that monster's original ATK.

flavorText: A walking catastrophe that reshapes the land.

name: Infernal Phoenix

effects.name: Rebirth from Ashes
effects.description: Once per turn, if this card would be destroyed: It is not destroyed.

effects.name: Phoenix Flame
effects.description: When this card is Summoned: Inflict 800 damage to your opponent.

flavorText: Death cannot contain its eternal flame.

name: Infernal Overlord Vyraxis

effects.name: Infernal Dominion
effects.description: Once per turn: Destroy all monsters with ATK lower than this card's ATK.

effects.name: Burning Aura
effects.description: All 'Infernal Dragons' monsters you control gain 500 ATK.

effects.name: Phoenix Rebirth
effects.description: If this card is destroyed: Special Summon 1 'Infernal Dragons' monster from your GY.

flavorText: The supreme ruler of all dragonkind.

name: Apocalypse Dragon

effects.name: World's End
effects.description: When Summoned: Destroy all other cards on the field.

effects.name: Apocalyptic Flame
effects.description: This card inflicts piercing battle damage. When this card inflicts battle damage: Inflict 1000 additional damage.

effects.name: Undying Flame
effects.description: Cannot be targeted by opponent's card effects.

flavorText: Its awakening heralds the end of all things.

name: Dragon's Fury

effects.name: Dragon's Fury
effects.description: Target 1 'Infernal Dragons' monster you control; it gains 500 ATK until end of turn.

flavorText: Channel the rage of a thousand dragons.

name: Volcanic Eruption

effects.name: Volcanic Eruption
effects.description: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

flavorText: The mountain's wrath unleashed.

name: Infernal Recovery

effects.name: Infernal Recovery
effects.description: Add 1 'Infernal Dragons' monster with 1500 or less ATK from your GY to your hand.

flavorText: Even in death, the flame persists.

name: Fire Breathing

effects.name: Fire Breathing
effects.description: Target 1 'Infernal Dragons' monster you control; it can attack directly this turn, but its ATK is halved.

flavorText: Strike past their defenses.

name: Sudden Ignition

effects.name: Sudden Ignition
effects.description: Target 1 'Infernal Dragons' monster you control; it gains 800 ATK until end of turn. (Quick Spell)

flavorText: The flame burns brightest in battle.

name: Infernal Barrier

effects.name: Infernal Barrier
effects.description: Negate 1 attack targeting an 'Infernal Dragons' monster you control. (Quick Spell)

flavorText: A wall of flames protects the dragons.

name: Scorching Wind

effects.name: Scorching Wind
effects.description: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; it loses 600 ATK until end of turn. (Quick Spell)

flavorText: The wind carries burning embers.

name: Infernal Furnace

effects.name: Infernal Furnace
effects.description: Once per turn: Inflict 200 damage to your opponent for each 'Infernal Dragons' monster you control. (Continuous Spell)

flavorText: The furnace of destruction never cools.

name: Dragon's Hoard

effects.name: Dragon's Hoard
effects.description: Once per turn, when an 'Infernal Dragons' monster inflicts battle damage: Draw 1 card. (Continuous Spell)

flavorText: Victory brings wealth beyond measure.

name: Volcanic Lair

effects.name: Volcanic Lair
effects.description: All 'Infernal Dragons' monsters gain 300 ATK. Once per turn: You can Normal Summon 1 additional 'Infernal Dragons' monster. (Field Spell)

flavorText: Within the volcano, dragons reign supreme.

name: Flame Trap

effects.name: Flame Trap
effects.description: When your opponent's monster declares an attack: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

flavorText: Step into the fire.

name: Burning Revenge

effects.name: Burning Revenge
effects.description: When an 'Infernal Dragons' monster you control is destroyed: Inflict 800 damage to your opponent.

flavorText: Even in death, they strike back.

name: Ring of Fire

effects.name: Ring of Fire
effects.description: Your opponent takes 200 damage each time they Normal Summon a monster. (Continuous Trap)

flavorText: The flames encircle all who enter.

name: Infernal Presence

effects.name: Infernal Presence
effects.description: 'Infernal Dragons' monsters you control cannot be targeted by Spell effects. (Continuous Trap)

flavorText: The flames shield their own.

name: Dragon's Wrath

effects.name: Dragon's Wrath
effects.description: When your opponent activates a card effect: Negate that effect, and if you control an 'Infernal Dragons' monster, destroy that card. (Counter Trap)

flavorText: Defy the dragons at your peril.
